ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] GZ answers some bard questions
ygData.msgSnippet: fyi the stats on singing steel greaves are: AC 24 8str 8sta 8agi 8cha Effect: *drum roll* Summon Food nice stats and AC, but gimme a break on the effect (i may
ygData.messageBody:
fyi the stats on singing steel greaves are:

AC 24 8str 8sta 8agi 8cha Effect: *drum roll* Summon Food

nice stats and AC, but gimme a break on the effect (i may be wrong on the
stats, but the AC is right and there are defeinitely 3 or 4 stats +8). the
cobalt (warrior) greaves have effect: invisibility on top of phenomenal AC
and stats. what a novel thought, give a class something they don't normally
have and something they would absolutely love! i mean so far the AC on
singing steel is better than all imbrued pieces, and seems all classes
gloves/boots/arms/bracers will have an effect and good AC but no stats,
while the legs all have stats. and most likely the BP when someone
eventually finds one, supposedly all having effect: gate, something no melee
class gets.

Shada

p.s. no i didn't get the greaves, but i did get an RBB =)

> Hmm, let me make sure I understand this. The effect on the
> boots and gloves
> is so powerful that they made the AC lower.
